meanings.sent1: She teared up when she watched the sad movie.
meanings.sent2: He teared during the emotional speech.
meanings.sent3: The clown's teared face paint made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her teared eyes reflected her deep emotions.
meanings.sent5: The teared cheeks showed her sorrow clearly.

meanings.sent1: She accidentally teared the paper while folding it.
meanings.sent2: He teared the fabric while trying to sew it.
meanings.sent3: The naughty puppy teared the pillow apart.
meanings.sent4: The storm teared the roof off the house.
meanings.sent5: The strong wind teared the flag into pieces.
